alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 9:13AM PST until February 15 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Esmeralda, Nye, and Lincoln County. * WHEN...through 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects, cause damage to some structures, and result in areas of blowing dust. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As of this morning, Tonopah Airport has gusted up to 54 mph with several other area observations eclipsing 50 mph gusts. Some lowered visibility has been reported as well due to snowfall or dust.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
